creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four lines of bold, confident calligraphy, mounted on white board with thin gold outline; rectangular intaglio stamp URC and at LLC
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio seal; LLC, rectangular intaglio seal; on back of mount, LLC, in pencil: [Kaneko Sanmin] and on back LLC, in ink, in Japanese
title: Ocean Clouds
